title: I'm A Creative Ui/Ux Designer And Front End Web Developer
subtitle: I'm a Web Designer and Front End Developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional user interfaces and websites.

sec-2.title: About Me
sec-2.subtitle: I'm currently a student at the University of Al_Kitap at Iraq/kirkuk, I study dental prosthesis so i have to divide my time between my studies and programming. I have a passion for creating and designing beautiful and functional web applications. I have a strong desire to learn and grow as a developer.
